title: Just lost 6 lp due to serves not letting me lock in
body: so im down 6 and a 30 min ban due to accepting que and it not putting me in game, then after a 5 man wait i re-logged  and then couldnt ban a champion. Would really appreciated if my negative lp was fixed! Not mad, just dont wanna get demoted :P

replies.body:
Yes something is wrong with the server

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
